metadata.title: Althara - Tinder for Off-Market Luxury Assets
metadata.description: Exclusive platform connecting discrete sellers with qualified buyers through intelligent matching for premium assets. Real estate, jewelry, art and more.
metadata.keywords: real estate investment, premium assets, co-investment, Mallorca, luxury properties, intelligent matching

description.line2: that are not in the public market.

description.line1: Althara is the first intelligent matching platform for off-market luxury assets.
description.line2: Our algorithm connects premium asset owners with qualified buyers through a verified and secure process.
description.line3: With years of experience in the real estate sector, our team combines advanced technology with market knowledge to ensure successful and discrete connections.

intro.line2: It's a private intelligent connection platform where:

diff1.title: DIFFERENTIATOR 1
diff1.heading:
Exclusive
Platform
diff1.description: We validate and verify every profile, investor or owner.

diff2.title: DIFFERENTIATOR 2
diff2.heading:
Advanced
Algorithm
diff2.description: Prioritizes real compatibility based on risk profile and budget

diff3.title: DIFFERENTIATOR 3
diff3.heading:
Professional
Intermediation
diff3.description: Automatic NDA and standardized documentation with professional intermediation.

step1.title: Verification And Profiling
step1.description: Every user, whether owner or buyer, goes through a rigorous verification process. We define their needs and preferences to ensure precise and discrete matching.

step2.title: Preference Configuration
step2.description: Owners and buyers define their specific parameters. Our system analyzes these preferences to automatically identify compatibilities.

step3.title: Intelligent Matching
step3.description: Our advanced algorithm analyzes thousands of data points to identify perfect compatibilities, connecting exclusive opportunities with qualified investors.

step4.title: Secure Connection And Advisory
step4.description: Once there's a match, we facilitate the connection under NDA. Our team provides the necessary support to ensure transparency and security of the operation.

step5.title: Opportunity Closure
step5.description: After connection and advisory, the parties proceed to close the transaction outside the platform, confident of having found the ideal opportunity or buyer.

whoIsItFor.title: WHO IS IT FOR
whoIsItFor.heading: Who Is Althara For
whoIsItFor.description: Our platform is designed for exclusive profiles who value discretion, efficiency and access to unique opportunities in the off-market luxury assets market.

investors.title: Investors
investors.description: For those seeking to diversify their portfolio with unique assets that offer superior appreciation potential to the traditional market.

owners.title: Owners
owners.description: For those who value total discretion and don't want their assets to appear on public portals or social networks.

advisors.title: Advisors
advisors.description: For professionals who need advanced tools to connect exclusive opportunities with qualified clients.

card1.description: 80% of luxury assets are traded discretely. Althara opens the doors to this exclusive market.
card1.title: Privileged access
card1.subtitle: Unique opportunities

card2.description: Our algorithm connects your preferences with assets that really interest you, saving you time and effort.
card2.title: Intelligent connection
card2.subtitle: Define your preferences

card3.description: Every interaction and transaction is managed with maximum professionalism, discretion and a transparent legal process.
card3.title: Security and trust
card3.subtitle: Verification and support

footer.description: Private platform connecting owners and investors in singular operations, with structured co-investment and secure processes.

contactModal.title: Contact Althara
contactModal.description: We connect investors and premium asset owners intelligently and securely.
